title: Moti Polki Jadau Choker with Emerald Drops: A Timeless Elegance
features: This exquisitely handcrafted choker and earring set embodies the traditional Jadau Kundan setting, with each polki diamond meticulously placed. The multi-strand pearl choker (Gutta Pusalu inspired) is punctuated with emerald and polki encrusted motifs. The pendant and earrings feature cascading emerald drops, adding a touch of regal charm. The back features intricate gold detailing, showcasing superior craftsmanship.

description: This set is a testament to the enduring beauty of traditional Hyderabadi jewelry. The use of genuine polki diamonds and Zambian emeralds ensures lasting value. The intricate Jadau craftsmanship, passed down through generations, makes this a true heirloom piece. The combination of traditional and modern aesthetics makes it versatile for various occasions. The Hyderabadi seed pearls are known for their lustre and are perfectly complemented by the antique gold finish.
